mkultra.item_stats.crit_damage.name: 暴擊傷害
mkultra.item_stats.crit_chance.name: 暴擊機率
mkultra.armor_class.heavy.name: 重甲
mkultra.armor_class.medium.name: 中甲
mkultra.armor_class.light.name: 輕甲
mkultra.armor_class.robes.name: 長袍
mkultra.armor_class.undefined.name: 受限制的盔甲
mkultra.armor_class.digger.name: 礦工的盔甲
mkultra.ability.arrow_storm.name: 箭矢風暴
mkultra.ability.ball_lightning.name: 球狀閃電
mkultra.ability.ball_lightning.descripti: 發射一個能對經過的所有敵人造成傷害的球形閃電
mkultra.ability.crescent_slash.name: 新月斬
mkultra.ability.crescent_slash.descripti: 攻擊一個敵人，並對周圍的所有敵人造成傷害。
mkultra.ability.desperate_surge.name: 絕望的浪潮
mkultra.ability.drown.name: 溺水
mkultra.ability.drown.description: 發射一個可以在一定時間內持續造成傷害的炮彈
mkultra.ability.duality_rune.name: 雙面符咒
mkultra.ability.duality_rune.description: 在地面上放置一個會在一秒鐘後爆炸的符咒，在治療周圍友軍的同時也會傷害敵人
mkultra.ability.phoenix_aspect.name: Phoenix Aspect
mkultra.ability.phoenix_aspect.descripti: 賦予你鳳凰的能力，這會讓你擁有更少的冷卻時間並讓你可以飛行，同時你的火焰之刃的傷害會大大提高
mkultra.ability.ember.name: 餘燼
mkultra.ability.ember.description: 對目標造成傷害並使其猛烈地燃燒起來。
mkultra.ability.esuna.name: 復原
mkultra.ability.esuna.description: 恢復魔力並治療周圍的友軍
mkultra.ability.fairy_fire.name: 精靈火
mkultra.ability.fairy_fire.description: 發射一個會爆炸的投射物，對敵人造成傷害並使他們發光。
mkultra.ability.fire_armor.name: 火焰護甲
mkultra.ability.fire_armor.description: 增強周圍的所有玩家，給予他們吸收和火焰抗性。
mkultra.ability.fire_arrow.name: 火焰
mkultra.ability.fire_arrow.description: 發射一支可以讓怪物著火的箭，如果敵人已經著火，那麼敵人將爆炸
mkultra.ability.flame_blade.name: 火焰之刃
mkultra.ability.flame_blade.description: 增強周圍的所有玩家，並讓他們傷害怪物時有燃燒
mkultra.ability.flame_wave.name: 炎之浪潮
mkultra.ability.flame_wave.description: 對你周圍的所有敵人造成傷害，如果他們正在燃燒將會造成雙重傷害
mkultra.ability.flint_hound.name: 燧石追蹤
mkultra.ability.flint_hound.description: 生成能夠用來製作箭的燧石和羽毛。
mkultra.ability.furious_brooding.name: 狂怒回復
mkultra.ability.furious_brooding.descrip: 在短時間內減緩你的速度同時恢復健康。
mkultra.ability.galvanize.name: 震激
mkultra.ability.galvanize.description: 治療你周圍的所有玩家並給予他們跳躍buff
mkultra.ability.geyser.name: 噴泉
mkultra.ability.geyser.description: 製造一個會在撞擊地面後一會兒爆炸的拋射物，爆炸會將所有人拋向空中，敵人將會受到傷害，而友軍則會獲得回復、羽落和漂浮效果。
mkultra.ability.golden_opportunity.name: 黃金機會
mkultra.ability.golden_opportunity.descr: 用附近的材料製作金或者鐵鎬。
mkultra.ability.heal.name: 治癒
mkultra.ability.heal.description: 治療你的目標，不選定目標時治療你自己。對不死生物造成傷害。
mkultra.ability.heaving_seas.name: 海洋湧盪
mkultra.ability.heaving_seas.description: 對你周圍的敵人造成傷害並擊退他們，同時給予他們緩慢效果。
mkultra.ability.hope_bread.name: 希望之飼
mkultra.ability.hope_bread.description: 用周圍潛藏的希望來製造麵包。
mkultra.ability.ignite.name: 點火
mkultra.ability.ignite.description: 對目標造成傷害，而如果目標已經起火了的話，就會點燃周圍的地表並對點燃敵人造成傷害。
mkultra.ability.inspire.name: 激勵
mkultra.ability.inspire.description: 激勵你的隊友，給予他們速度並給予他們生命回復效果。
mkultra.ability.kanye_cutter.name: 偷襲
mkultra.ability.kanye_cutter.description: 偷襲你的敵人，並對其造成傷害並施加凋零效果
mkultra.ability.kp_dark_wail.name: KP的黑暗悲鳴
mkultra.ability.kp_dark_wail.description: 傷害並束縛你周圍的敵人。
mkultra.ability.lava_wanderer.name: 熔岩漫步
mkultra.ability.lava_wanderer.descriptio: 給予你和你的隊友火焰保護和挖掘加速效果
mkultra.ability.life_spring.name: 生命之泉
mkultra.ability.life_spring.description: 治療一定區域內所有的友軍
mkultra.ability.mass_drown.name: 水墓術
mkultra.ability.mass_drown.description: 對目標及其周圍的敵人造成溺水傷害。
mkultra.ability.mileys_bangerz.name: Miley的激昂青春大爆炸
mkultra.ability.mileys_bangerz.descripti: 給予你的友軍吸收效果並提升他們的攻擊力。
mkultra.ability.moon_trance.name: 月光迷幻曲
mkultra.ability.moon_trance.description: 增強周圍的所有玩家，給予他們魔力回復和護盾。
mkultra.ability.nocturnal_communion.name: 夜之狂宴
mkultra.ability.nocturnal_communion.desc: 強化周圍的玩家, 並給他們偷取生命的能力
mkultra.ability.notorious_dot.name: Christopher的持續傷害
mkultra.ability.notorious_dot.descriptio: 對你周圍所有的敵人造成傷害
mkultra.ability.pierce_the_heavens.name: 刺破天空
mkultra.ability.pierce_the_heavens.descr: 創造一些梯子可以讓你上天的梯子
mkultra.ability.poison_arrow.name: 毒箭
mkultra.ability.poison_arrow.description: 發射一支能使敵人中毒並減緩其移速的魔法箭，當你此技能等級二級的時候這個效果還會擴散到附近的敵人。
mkultra.ability.power_word_summon.name: 強力召喚
mkultra.ability.power_word_summon.descri: 召喚你的小弟，在短時間內可以困住敵人
mkultra.ability.practiced_hunter.name: 獵人專家
mkultra.ability.practiced_hunter.descrip: 獲得獵人應有的夜視能力並回復飽食度
mkultra.ability.repulse.name: 震退
mkultra.ability.slaying_edge.name: 致命之刃
mkultra.ability.slaying_edge.description: 對一個目標造成巨大的傷害，如果你殺死了它，那麼就會增強你的隊友。
mkultra.ability.smite.name: 神聖
mkultra.ability.smite.description: 召喚神聖力量來傷害你的敵人，同時也會能讓你的敵人靜止一段時間
mkultra.ability.spirit_of_wolf.name: 狼之魂
mkultra.ability.spirit_of_wolf.descripti: 加快你的施法目標的速度。
mkultra.ability.stunning_shout.name: 麻醉射擊
mkultra.ability.tnt_whisperer.name: TNT大師
mkultra.ability.undertow.name: 暗潮
mkultra.ability.undertow.description: 增強周圍的所有玩家，增加他們對溺水敵人的傷害。
mkultra.ability.underway.name: 行進
mkultra.ability.underway.description: 增強周圍的所有玩家，給予他們移動速度和技能冷卻減免。
mkultra.ability.vampiric_revere.name: 血之崇拜
mkultra.ability.vampiric_revere.descript: 啟動技能時可以讓你在攻擊他人時偷取生命，但每次攻擊均會消耗1點魔力值。
mkultra.ability.warp_curse.name: 傳送之咒
mkultra.ability.warp_curse.description: 對你的敵人造成持續傷害並將他們隨機傳送到一個地方。
mkultra.ability.wave_break.name: 波浪停息
mkultra.ability.wave_break.description: 啟動時能極大提升你生命、護甲和魔法護甲，但你同伴被攻擊時，你要承擔他所受的傷害。
mkultra.ability.wave_dash.name: 波流衝刺
mkultra.ability.wave_dash.description: 向前衝刺並對路上所有目標造成傷害。
mkultra.ability.wild_toxin.name: 狂野劇毒
mkultra.ability.wild_toxin.description: 啟動時你的攻擊可以減緩敵人的移動速度並削弱他們的裝甲。
mkultra.ability.whirlpool.name: 潮漩
mkultra.ability.whirlpool.description: 在地上放一個漩渦，把敵人吸引過來並造成持續傷害。
mkultra.ability.whirlwind_blades.name: 旋風斬
mkultra.ability.whirlwind_blades.descrip: 對靠近你的敵人造成多次傷害。
mkultra.ability.yank.name: 猛拉
mkultra.ability.yank.description: 將你所對準的目標拉到你面前
mkultra.ability.yaup.name: 大喊
mkultra.ability.yaup.description: 提升你和友軍的攻擊速度與傷害一小會兒，並提升你自己的暴擊率。
mkultra.ability.skin_like_wood.name: 木化外觀
mkultra.ability.skin_like_wood.descripti: 啟動技能時提升你的護甲，你每次受傷都會消耗一些魔力。
mkultra.ability.natures_remedy.name: 自然治療
mkultra.ability.natures_remedy.descripti: 給予你的目標10/15秒的治療效果。
mkultra.ability.spirit_bomb.name: 靈魂衝擊
mkultra.ability.spirit_bomb.description: 發射一個2秒後會爆炸的射彈，並對該區域內的敵人造成傷害。
mkultra.ability.cleansing_seed.name: 清除效果
mkultra.ability.cleansing_seed.descripti: 發射一個能消除所有負面效果並對敵人造成傷害的炮彈
mkultra.ability.explosive_growth.name: 爆炸性增長
mkultra.ability.explosive_growth.descrip: 衝向前方，破壞你擊中的所有敵人，並對你的盟友和你自己清除所有藥水效果並施放恢復效果。

mkultra.talent.two_handed_style.name: Two-Handed Style
mkultra.talent.two_handed_style.descript: Grants 4 armor if you are using a two-handed weapon in your mainhand
mkultra.ability.two_handed_style.name: Two-Handed Style
mkultra.ability.two_handed_style.descrip: Grants 4 armor if you are using a two-handed weapon in your mainhand
mkultra.talent.dual_wield.name: Dual Wield
mkultra.talent.dual_wield.description: Allows the player to fight with a weapon in the off-hand as well
mkultra.ability.dual_wield.name: Dual Wield
mkultra.ability.dual_wield.description: Allows the player to fight with a weapon in the off-hand as well
mkultra.talent.blademaster.name: Blademaster
mkultra.talent.blademaster.description: Increases your crit rate by 5%% and your melee crit damage by 50%%
mkultra.ability.blademaster.name: Blademaster
mkultra.ability.blademaster.description: Increases your crit rate by 5%% and your melee crit damage by 50%%
mkultra.talent.holy_aura.name: Holy Aura
mkultra.talent.holy_aura.description: Reduces damage from undead creatures by 40%%, deals damage to all surrounding undead
mkultra.ability.holy_aura.name: Holy Aura
mkultra.ability.holy_aura.description: Reduces damage from undead creatures by 40%%, deals damage to all surrounding undead
mkultra.talent.armor_training.name: Armor Training
mkultra.talent.armor_training.descriptio: Allows the player to wear one higher class of armor
mkultra.ability.armor_training.name: Armor Training
mkultra.ability.armor_training.descripti: Allows the player to wear one higher class of armor
mkultra.ability.life_siphon.name: Life Siphon
mkultra.ability.life_siphon.description: Everytime you kill a mob with melee damage, restore 4 hp
mkultra.talent.life_siphon.name: Life Siphon
mkultra.talent.life_siphon.description: Everytime you kill a mob with melee damage, restore 4 hp
mkultra.ability.soul_drain.name: Soul Drain
mkultra.ability.soul_drain.description: Everytime you kill a mob with magic damage, restore 4 mana
mkultra.talent.soul_drain.name: Soul Drain
mkultra.talent.soul_drain.description: Everytime you kill a mob with magic damage, restore 4 mana
mkultra.talent.guardian_angel.name: Guardian Angel
mkultra.talent.guardian_angel.descriptio: Absorbs a killing blow and grants invulnerability for 10 seconds. Usable every 2 minutes
mkultra.ability.guardian_angel.name: Guardian Angel
mkultra.ability.guardian_angel.descripti: Absorbs a killing blow and grants invulnerability for 10 seconds. Usable every 2 minutes
mkultra.ui_msg.learn_ultimate_prompt: Right click to slot an ultimate
mkultra.ui_msg.no_ultimates: You do not know any ultimate abilities
mkultra.talent.meteor.name: Meteor
mkultra.talent.meteor.description: Calls down meteors doing explosive damage all around you.
mkultra.ability.meteor.name: Meteor
mkultra.ability.meteor.description: Calls down meteors doing explosive damage all around you.
mkultra.talent.healing_rain.name: Healing Rain
mkultra.talent.healing_rain.description: Heals all friendlies in an area around you.
mkultra.ability.healing_rain.name: Healing Rain
mkultra.ability.healing_rain.description: Heals all friendlies in an area around you.
mkultra.talent.backstab.name: Backstab
mkultra.talent.backstab.description: Deals melee damage to your target, if you are behind them the damage is significantly higher and your cooldowns will be reduced by 2 seconds.
mkultra.ability.backstab.name: Backstab
mkultra.ability.backstab.description: Deals melee damage to your target, if you are behind them the damage is significantly higher and your cooldowns will be reduced by 2 seconds.
mkultra.talent_type.ultimate.name: Ultimate Ability Talent
mkultra.talent.bolstering_roar.name: Bolstering Roar
mkultra.talent.bolstering_roar.descripti: Adds Armor, Magic Armor, Absorption, and Melee Crit Damage to all allies around you.
mkultra.ability.bolstering_roar.name: Bolstering Roar
mkultra.ability.bolstering_roar.descript: Adds Armor, Magic Armor, Absorption, and Melee Crit Damage to all allies around you.
mkultra.talent.righteous_judgement.name: Righteous Judgement
mkultra.talent.righteous_judgement.descr: DoTs and slows all surrounding enemies for 20 seconds. Stuns them for 2 seconds.
mkultra.ability.righteous_judgement.name: Righteous Judgement
mkultra.ability.righteous_judgement.desc: DoTs and slows all surrounding enemies for 20 seconds. Stuns them for 2 seconds.
mkultra.client_data.sun_icon.text: Give your brouzoufs to Solarius. Receive his blessings.
mkultra.client_data.moon_icon.text: Thalassa, Goddess of the Moon, demands brouzouf in exchange for her powers.
mkultra.client_data.desperate_icon.text: Ydira, Elusive Spirit of the Wood, will increase your powers in exchange for brouzouf.
mkultra.client_data.ranger_icon.text: The Watchful Ranger taught you the basics, but you must exchange brouzouf to learn more.
